character_cards.name: Goblin Slave
character_cards.description: A Goblin slave under the rule of Crimson Banner.

character_cards.name: Runeborn Slave
character_cards.description: A Runeborn slave under the rule of Crimson Banner.

character_cards.name: Trollkin Slave – Crimson Banner
character_cards.description: A Trollkin slave under the rule of Crimson Banner.

class_cards.name: Brawler
class_cards.description: Close-range melee expert.

class_cards.name: Pit Brawler
class_cards.description: An arena bruiser with relentless attack force.

class_cards.name: Junk Knight
class_cards.description: Wears salvaged gear to endure harsh battles.

class_cards.name: Torchbearer
class_cards.description: Ignites the battlefield with searing flames.
class_cards.passive: Burns enemy for 3 damage for 2 turns.

class_cards.name: Monk
class_cards.description: Channeling unarmed fury with disciplined strikes.
class_cards.passive: First attack each turn is free.

class_cards.name: Weld Beast
class_cards.description: A hybrid fighter fueled by molten fury.
class_cards.passive: Deals an extra 2 fire damage to adjacent units.

class_cards.name: beast tamer
class_cards.description: Commands loyal beasts in battle.
class_cards.passive: Summons a hound with 1 HP each turn.

class_cards.name: Undead World
class_cards.effect: Revive as Undead with 50% HP upon death; Undead gain +2 ATK
class_cards.description: Each time a character dies, 50% chance to revive as Undead at half health; Undead units gain +2 ATK.
class_cards.flavor_text: The domain of Graveyard World, shaping all who stand within.

class_cards.name: Skyborn Citadel
class_cards.effect: Hobgoblin units gain +2 ATK
class_cards.description: All Hobgoblin units gain +2 ATK while this field is active.
class_cards.flavor_text: The domain of Skyborn Citadel, shaping all who stand within.

class_cards.name: Forge of Cinders
class_cards.effect: Machines gain +1 ATK/DEF and ignore trap effects
class_cards.description: Machine units gain +1 ATK and +1 DEF and are immune to trap effects.
class_cards.flavor_text: The domain of Forge of Cinders, shaping all who stand within.

class_cards.name: Beastcaller's Den
class_cards.effect: Beasts gain +1 ATK, cannot be feared; summon Level 1 Beast on Beast death
class_cards.description: Beast units gain +1 ATK and immunity to Fear; once per field, summon a Level 1 Beast when a Beast ally dies.
class_cards.flavor_text: The domain of Beastcaller's Den, shaping all who stand within.

class_cards.name: Clockwork Wastes
class_cards.effect: Machines gain +1 ATK/DEF and ignore trap effects
class_cards.description: Machine units gain +1 ATK and +1 DEF and are immune to trap effects.
class_cards.flavor_text: The domain of Clockwork Wastes, shaping all who stand within.

class_cards.name: Holy Sanctuary
class_cards.effect: Healing effects doubled; Undead take 2 damage at turn start
class_cards.description: All healing effects are doubled. Undead units take 2 damage at the start of their turn.
class_cards.flavor_text: The domain of Holy Sanctuary, shaping all who stand within.

class_cards.name: Cursed Battlefield
class_cards.effect: Apply Plague: deal 2 damage to random enemy on each death
class_cards.description: Whenever a character dies, apply Plague to a random enemy, dealing 2 damage per turn for 2 turns.
class_cards.flavor_text: The domain of Cursed Battlefield, shaping all who stand within.

class_cards.name: Mirror Realm
class_cards.effect: Reflect 25% of damage back to attacker
class_cards.description: All damage dealt by characters is reflected 25% back at the attacker.
class_cards.flavor_text: The domain of Mirror Realm, shaping all who stand within.

class_cards.name: Arcane Academy
class_cards.effect: Draw an extra card on OnPlay
class_cards.description: When you play a card, draw one extra card.
class_cards.flavor_text: The domain of Arcane Academy, shaping all who stand within.

class_cards.name: Frozen Tundra
class_cards.effect: Enemies take 1 cold damage at turn start; -1 SPD
class_cards.description: Enemies take 1 cold damage at the start of their turn and have -1 SPD.
class_cards.flavor_text: The domain of Frozen Tundra, shaping all who stand within.

class_cards.description: Whenever an enemy attacks, they take 1 burn damage.
